name: God Vibrations
description:
Multiplayer 2D platform versus game for 2-4 players inspired by Smash Bros and Towerfall, where jumpy kawaii gods fights in locations where the ground vibrates to the music. All of that because of that bard who sing stories about gods he doesn't know!

~ Bard's Song ~
My good fellows,
hear presently the tale
of four warrior gods
that almost nobody knows,
and their pointless fight

Until only one survive


How To Play

Be the last god!
Just make these other half-gods meet their doom by pushing them into spikes and the dreadful bottomless pit!
But no jumping!
For elevation you must rely on the pillars of rythm which resonates to the music as a 90's hifi display.


Controls

You can just walk left, right and dash in both directions.
Play with game controllers (Xbox, Playstation) and/or the keyboard for each player without a controller.
Default mapping of the keyboard : in order below for Validate Left Back Right.
For Player 1: Z Q S D (azerty-style)
For Player 2: O K L M (azerty-style)
For Player 3: Arrows Up Left Down Right
For Player 4: Numeric keypad 8 4 5 6


Credits

Game made by the team NoDevAtAll
during the Global Game Jam 2017

Arts : Antoine Schmoll ~ Sylvain Bourrieres
Audio : Jeremy Touitou
Design : Elsa Becker ~ Gilles Noeppel
Programming : Julien Doudoux ~ Martin Jeandon ~ Sven Duval

Contact

Thanks for playing!
